person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The Australian opposition on Friday demanded a high-powered investigation into paedophilia in the Australian diplomatic service after the federal court forced the head of the existing inquiry to stand aside .

Let's think step by step.

In this paragraph, the following entities can be identified as "Person":

1. Australian opposition
2. head of the existing inquiry (whose name is not provided in the paragraph)
3. federal court
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Person.

Sure, here are the entities that refer to "Person" in the paragraph:

1. head of the existing inquiry
2. federal court

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the entities that refer to "Person" in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table:

| Person |
| --- |
| head of the existing inquiry |
| federal court |
